com.aurel.track.lucene.search

Interface ILookupFieldSearcher

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractAssociatedFieldSearcher, AbstractListFieldSearcher, AbstractLookupFieldSearcher, AttachmentSearcher, BudgetPlanSearcher, ExpenseSearcher, ExternalListSearcher, LinkSearcher, LocalizedListCompositePartSearcher, LocalizedListSearcher, NotLocalizedListSearcher

    public interface ILookupFieldSearcher
    Base interface for searching strings not directly contained in the workItems (list labels and strings in associated entities)
